name: Collapse
description: Click the buttons below to show and hide another element. It requires either id or group (but not both) for this to work.

options.name: id
options.description: With id you can control individual collapse elements. Use same unique id for both <collapse> and <collapse-toggle> elements.

options.name: group
options.description: With group you can control a number of collapse elements. Use same unique group for all <collapse> and <collapse-toggle> elements.
